steps.step: Add all of the water to the pot
Add all of the Garlic Cloves to the pot
Add all of the Garlic Powder to the pot
Add all of the Mustard Powder to the pot
Add all of the Butter to the pot
Stir to mix all of the contents together
Set the timer for 30 Minutes on the instant pot
When finished, open the instant pot
Add all of the heavy cream to the pot
Add all of the cheeses to the pot
Add all of the black pepper
Stir to mix all of the contents together
